name: Kessaku-sen! Ganbare Goemon 1 + 2: Yukihime and Magginesu
overview: A port of the first two Ganbare Goemon games from the Super Famicom on the Game Boy Advance. Aside from portability, the main differences includes; - All multiplayer features removed. - Being able to change characters on the fly with a single button press. - The port of the first game contains an extra save file slot. - A Mini-game option is available on the title screen. Other than these changes, the two ports stay the same as their Super Famicom counterparts.
